title: SynRAG: A Large Language Model Framework for Executable Query Generation in Heterogeneous SIEM System
dimension: Adaptation to Rapidly Evolving AI Threat Landscape
summary: Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) systems are essential for large enterprises to monitor their IT infrastructure by ingesting and analyzing millions of logs and events daily. Security Operations Center (SOC) analysts are tasked with monitoring and analyzing this vast data to identify
